plot: What begins as a misunderstanding leads to Strawberry and her pals creating a Berry Bitty City-style "tropical" resort, which might also land their friend Cherry Jam on TV!
title: Strawberry Shortcake: Fun Under the Sun
plot_es: What begins as a misunderstanding leads to Strawberry and her pals creating a Berry Bitty City-style "tropical" resort, which might also land their friend Cherry Jam on TV!
original_name: Strawberry Shortcake: Fun Under the Sun
plot_en: What begins as a misunderstanding leads to Strawberry and her pals creating a Berry Bitty City-style "tropical" resort, which might also land their friend Cherry Jam on TV!
